full_summary:
**Executive Group Services**
================ossier des & services de Groupe de Direction@**

### Overview

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency is seeking proposals to provide strategic advice and analysis related to leadership styles of senior leaders within the agency. The selected service provider will offer detailed analysis and strategic advice to executives within the agency.

### Solicitation Period

The solicitation closes on 2023-12-05 at 15:00 ET (Eastern Time).

### Procurement Scope and Category

* **Procurement Category:** SRV (Services)
* **UNSPSC Code:** 86132000 (Management education and training services)
* **Description:** Management education and training services
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Traditional

### Requirements

The service provider will be required to:

* Provide detailed analysis and strategic advice related to leadership styles exhibited by senior leaders
* Offer expertise and insights to support executive decision-making
* Develop and present strategic plans to address identified leadership gaps

### Selection Criteria

The selection will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

### Notes and Terms

* This procurement has been conditionally set aside under the Federal Government Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB). If two or more indigenous businesses submit bids, the procurement will be set aside under PSIB.
* There is no security requirement applicable to this contract.
* Trade agreements and tax implications are not applicable.
* The proposed contract term is from December 11, 2023, to March 31, 2024.

### Contact Information and Bidding Instructions

Inquiries and submissions should be directed to:

Jo'Anne Cassidy
joanne.cassidy@inspection.gc.ca
(613) 355-8857

Bids should be submitted to:
cfia.bidreceipt-receptiondesoumission.acia@inspection.gc.ca

### Reference and Solicitation Information

**Title:** Executive Group Services
**Solicitation Number:** 2024-00131
**File Number:** 2024-00131

**Contracting Authority:**
Peter Vinh
Peter.Vinh@inspection.gc.ca
